title: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - In declare warning on binary files, the source path is displayed incorrectly [java|aj]. To reproduce the issue, refer to the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/. It should be noted that the tests in place may return false positives due to the lack of filename checking in the harness verification of messages. In AJDT, the filename is omitted if it makes no sense to AJDT.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
SR: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be displayed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
